rooms.name: Entrance Hallway & Living Area
rooms.description: A minimalist open space connecting the entrance to the living and dining areas. The design is in line with Vastu principles by aligning entrances to the east.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated area with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and a state-of-the-art sound system. The seating is arranged to maximize acoustics in a minimalist style.

rooms.name: Study / Home Office
rooms.description: A functional space for work and relaxation, designed with a modern open concept. It includes built-in shelves and minimalistic furniture.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The entrance is designed with a minimalist door and floor-to-ceiling windows on the adjacent wall to let in ample natural light.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: A spacious balcony attached to the living area that overlooks the front yard. It is designed per Vastu for good energy flow.

openings.name: Window Opening
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows in living area and study to enhance natural lighting and maintain a minimalistic aesthetic.

rooms.name: Studio Bedroom
rooms.description: A duplex studio apartment where the bedroom doubles as a living area. Features floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony for relaxation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern minimalist bathroom with built-in fixtures. The design respects privacy while aligning with Vastu for optimal energy.

openings.name: Bedroom Balcony
openings.description: A spacious balcony attached to the studio bedroom for a refreshing view and good ventilation as per Vastu.

openings.name: Upper Floor Window
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows on the upper floor to maintain a minimalist aesthetic and provide ample natural light.

vastu_notes.entrance_alignment: Ensure the main entrance faces east or northeast for positive energy flow.
vastu_notes.window_placement: Windows should be strategically placed to allow optimal natural lighting and ventilation, especially on the eastern side.
vastu_notes.balcony_usage: Balconies should be used as transitional spaces between indoor living areas and outdoor relaxation zones.
